author: Chloe Maveal
title: Coronavirus measures are challenging the very core of the comics industry
description: Thanks to Diamond Comic Distributors near-monopoly on new comic distribution, the impact of COVID-19 is changing how comic books are bought and sold in America. Publishers like Marvel, DC, Image, TKO, Dark Horse, and Archie are all taking different measures t…
content: The COVID-19 pandemic has shaken the core of almost every aspect of the entertainment landscape. With movies being pushed back, TV shows on hold, and events of all sorts cancelled or postponed, one of the industries proving to be most affected by quarantining… [+12435 chars]
